properties.title: OOI CHLA profile metrics (0–200 m, 10 m bins) with PACE matchups
properties.description: Depth-binned CHLA profile metrics from OOI Profilers and Moorings (Mar 2024–Dec 2025), binned from 0–200 m in 10 m bins using unadjusted CHLA values, matched to PACE OCI Level-3 4 km v3.1 Daily Rrs, chlor_a, and Kd_490. Profiles are matched to PACE Level-3 pixels within ±24 hours of the profile start time and to the nearest 4 km grid cell in latitude/longitude.
